name: Syro - a game where your key bindings are out of control
name_original: Syro - a game where your key bindings are out of control
description:
Don't forget to leave a rating no matter if you liked the game or not :) Any feedback is also very much appreciated (good or bad!).

This game was created for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam

Thanks to Evan King for providing the music:

  • Music: Evan King - Entropy
